headline: Community initiatives for web-native development
intro: Join in the conversation and community-wide initiatives for web-native development!

quickstarts.title: WebQit Github
quickstarts.desc: Click to follow us and our open source work on Github! Ask questions, raise issues, make pull requests.

quickstarts.title: WebQit Twitter
quickstarts.desc: Click to follow WebQit on Twitter. Join conversations with hashtags #GoWebNative, #JustUseThePlatform!

quickstarts.title: The Web-Native CG
quickstarts.desc: Click to join the Web-Native Community Group. It's free and open!

ideaStart: The conversation around web-native development is happening right now - more than ever before - across blogs, twitter, etc! But the path to making it ubiquitous and something that is everyone's winning culture might still be a long way ahead! We'll need focused initiatives to facilitate it all - through participation, education, etc!
We're happy to join forces with you to develop initiatives that move the web forward ü§ù
ideaEnd: Follow WebQit, Inc. - @Web_Qit
